amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike all after the resolving clause and insert a complete new text entitled "Concurrent Resolution on the Budget for FY 2018" proposed by the Congresional Black Caucus. Amendment can be found on page H7826 of the Congressional Record dated October 4, 2017.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 115-339 and offered as the Congressional Black Caucus proposal.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 292 (Roll no. 554).

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Scott (VA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 292 (Roll no. 554).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Scott (VA).
